description:
What do NASA, Google Blogs, The Motley Fool, CFPB.gov, and the British
National Health Service all have in common? Their websites are powered
by Wagtail, the fastest-growing Python CMS that you've probably never
heard of. Because it is 100% free and open-source, you can build your
own website with Wagtail too!

We'll discuss:

-  What is Wagtail and what does it do?
-  How does it compare to other systems such as WordPress?
-  Overview of the Wagtail open-source project; how a team of volunteers
   makes this all possible.
-  Demo and brief getting started tutorial
title: Wagtail: The Python CMS Taking the World by Storm
